content.html: And the other thing when someone ends up in my bad column: I'm not mad at them anymore. I only get mad when I have hope. It's more of a fundamental write-off that I'm told is way way creepier than a grudge would be.
content.value:
And the other thing when someone ends up in my bad column: I'm not mad at them anymore. I only get mad when I have hope.

It's more of a fundamental write-off that I'm told is way way creepier than a grudge would be.
